summary: Brett Heising is the Founder and CEO of brettapproved.com, the world's foremost travel website for people with disabilities. Because travel is for everyone, the company's mission is to help its loyal community of users find accessible destinations for business or recreational travel.Brett was an inaugural member of SEED SPOT, a Phoenix-based competitive incubator for social entrepreneurs. Additionally, in 2015, he was recognized as a 40-under-40 up-and-coming business leader by The Phoenix Business Journal.Brett offers nearly two decades of experience in public affairs, public relations, media relations, journalism, advertising, corporate communications and crisis communications.A graduate of The Ohio State University where he obtained a Bachelor of Arts in Journalism with a specialization in Public Relations and a minor in Political Science, Brett moved to Phoenix in 1999.
name: Brett Heising
title: Founder and CEO at brettapproved, Inc.
